v1.4.1
======

 * Update ActiveMQ to 5.15.9
 * Add SonarQube exclusion property for JAXB-generated files
 * Remove IDE configuration files
 * Move XSDs to standard directory
 * Reconfigure JAXB to place generated sources in target/
